ai-atk-s0517a18:1_0: What is the commentary on the hidden conduct.
ai-atk-s0517a18:2_1: Now comes the description of seclusion in someone whose mind is capable of realizing anything that can be realized. They realize the supreme perfect awakening in the world with its gods. The attainment of the cessation of the world. They see the truth that is in order to discover what is beneficial, the cessation of the world.
ai-atk-s0517a18:2_2: is the commentary on the meaning of that dealing with the meaning.
ai-atk-s0517a18:3_0: The discussion of the teachers is finished.
